title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) Gains 1% as Index Trades Flat
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Bitcoin (BTC) was also a top performer, rising 0.7%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2503.6, up 0.1% (+3.51) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

Eight of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BCH (+1.0%) and BTC (+0.7%).

Laggards: APT (-3.5%) and NEAR (-3.0%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index was up only 0.1% with mixed performance among assets, indicating minor fluctuations and sideways market movement.
